info.name: API-PPBI
info.description: API documentation for PPBI (Persatuan Penggemar Bonsai Indonesia) backend system. This collection contains all endpoints for managing bonsai community, events, and related activities.

request.description: Login to obtain JWT token for authentication
Get list of all users with pagination
Get list of all event judges
Get list of all event categories
Get list of all event winners
Get list of all event judges
Get list of all branch settings
Get a single branch setting (no pagination)
Get list of all group settings
Get a single group setting (no pagination)
Get list of all access rights
